results.name: Expansion of (1+x)(1-x+x^2)/((1-x)(1+x^2)).
comment: Transform of A011782 under the Chebyshev mapping g(x)-> ((1-x^2)/(1+x^2)) * g(x/(1+x^2)).
Multiplicative with a(2) = 0, a(2^e) = 2 if e >= 2, a(p^e) = 1. [_David W. Wilson_, Jun 12 2005]
1, followed by period 4, repeat [1, 0, 1, 2]. [_Joerg Arndt_, Jan 06 2014]
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, -1, 1).
formula: a(n) = A007877(n+2), n>0. Dirichlet g.f. (1-1/2^s+2/4^s)*zeta(s). - _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 24 2011
a(n) = sign(n) - 1 + sqrt((n-2)^2 mod 8). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 04 2014
a(n) = a(n-4) for n>4. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 07 2016
